[oOc: at bottom]

--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop ---

Pacifix frowns at Dion, prefering to let the Decepticons go and 
setup the base defences, but does nothing. He opens a commlink 
to Hoist, "Hoist. How's the ship's computer comming along?"

Crossroads gets smashed by Slag, and he hits the side of the ship 
with a dull thud. "Whoa..." He shakes his head trying to shrug off 
the blow.

Pacifix shoots Crotale a brief smile, then turns to face the Dinobot, 
Slag and speaks, trying to smooth over the situation, "Slag, what 
Crossroads did has nothing to do with the Dinobots getting help 
from weaklings and neither is Crossroads a weakling." Not sure of 
how well he was doing, he simply presses on,  "He was giving 
Grimlock a gesture of respect. You need to help him up, and 
apologize to him." Pacifix finishes, hoping that he wouldn't end up 
in a fight with Slag, or any of the Dinobots for that matter.

Swoop, rather inclined to simply destroy the Decepticons, circles 
uncertainly, "Me Swoop want to stop Decepticons."

oOc: I created a poll. lol, Yan, why didn't you do that in the first 
place? =P



On 4 Aug 2001, at 23:07, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> OOC for everyone on the bottom.
> 
> ::Dion::
> 
> Dion listens to one of the Decepticons address Pacifix and smiles,
> lifting his rifle and firing three blasts at the trees around the
> retreating Decepticons as they begin to fly off. The trees explode,
> sending alot of spliters of wood flying at flyers.
